title: Kanojo, Okarishimasu (Rent-a-Girlfriend)
synopsis: Kazuya Kinoshita is a 20-year-old college student who has a wonderful girlfriend: the bright and sunny Mami Nanami. But suddenly, he doesn't. Without warning, Mami breaks up with him, leaving him utterly heartbroken and lonely. Seeking to soothe the pain, he hires a rental girlfriend through an online app. His partner is Chizuru Mizuhara, who through her unparalleled beauty and cute demeanor, manages to gain Kazuya's affection.
characters: ['Ichinose, Chizuru', 'Kinoshita, Kazuya', 'Nanami, Mami', 'Sakurasawa, Sumi', 'Sarashina, Ruka', 'Kibe, Yoshiaki', 'Kinoshita, Nagomi', 'Ichinose, Sayuri', 'Flea Market Saleswoman', 'Kuribayashi, Shun']
